Tomato - Early Blight.description: Caused by the fungus Alternaria solani. Appears as dark spots with concentric rings.
Tomato - Early Blight.treatment: Apply fungicides like chlorothalonil or copper-based sprays. Remove infected leaves.

Apple - Black Rot.description: A fungal disease caused by Botryosphaeria obtusa. Causes fruit rot and leaf spots.
Apple - Black Rot.treatment: Remove mummified fruit and infected branches. Apply captan or thiophanate-methyl.

Tomato - Healthy.description: No signs of disease. The leaf is healthy and shows uniform green color.
